overview.en: Health Chian HTHC is based on decentralized block chain technology, intelligent contracts, tamper-resistant, traceability features, on the basis of global health industry, carrying the beauty, health care, health behavior data such as the upper application, through to maximize health market, to realize the entire system of people's physical health regimen, longevity and enjoy life. HTHC is the infrastructure for the future of health.
overview.zh: 健康链HTHC是基于区块链技术去中心化，智能合约，不可篡改，可追溯性的特性，以全球健康产业为基础，承载美容，医疗，健康行为数据等上层应用，打通健康领域市场最大化，实现人们的身体全面系统的进行健康养生，享受生命长寿。健康链HTHC是未来健康领域的基础设施。
